articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: OpenAI and Jony Ive may be struggling to figure out their AI device - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI and Jony Ive reportedly face significant technical challenges as they work to develop a screen-less, AI-powered device.
articles.content:
OpenAI and Jony Ive face significant technical challenges as they work to develop a screen-less, AI-powered device, according to the Financial Times.
Back in May, OpenAI acquired io, the device star… [+900 chars]
